strategy_reasoning: Using a 'Garden Maintenance' metaphor in a cozy pixel art style makes technical updates (error codes, API endpoints) feel approachable and warm. The visual progression from fixing a gate (429 error) to expanding the map (socials) tells a story of growth consistent with the Pollinations brand.

images.prompt: Close up of a pixel art gardening journal lying on soft grass. Title text 'Update Log' in pixel font on the cover. A cute 8-bit bee rests on it. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender lighting. Cozy, nostalgic, lo-fi aesthetic like Unpacking. Chunky retro sprites, warm atmosphere.
images.description: Title card establishing the 'Garden Update' theme.

images.prompt: Cozy 8-bit pixel art scene. A friendly wooden garden gate labeled '429' with a sign saying 'Busy, wait a sec'. A tiny pixel character waits patiently with a clock icon. Soft pastel gradient background (mint to peach). Contrast with a scary red '401' sign lying on the ground (discarded). Warm lighting, retro gaming vibes like Stardew Valley.
images.description: Visualizing the fix where rate limits now return a friendly 'wait' (429) instead of a scary 'unauthorized' (401).

images.prompt: A cozy pixel art workbench in a garden shed. A glowing green scanner labeled 'Key Check'. A golden pixel key is floating above it, showing a green checkmark. Soft lime green (#ecf874) glow, warm brown wood tones. Chunky pixels, isometric view like Unpacking. Detailed and cute.
images.description: Illustrating the new /api/account/key endpoint for validating keys easily.

images.prompt: A pixel art world map in retro RPG style. A central garden labeled 'Pollinations' connecting to new floating islands with pixel icons for LinkedIn, Twitter (X), and Reddit. Cute pixel birds carrying messages between them. Soft pastel clouds, lime green (#ecf874) accents. Wholesome and adventurous.
images.description: Showing the expansion of the news workflow to new social platforms.

caption:
Garden maintenance complete! üõ†Ô∏èüå± We've been busy tending to the code-base and planting new seeds.

‚ú® **The Updates:**

üõë **No more scary errors:** Rate limits now correctly say "429 Too Many Requests" (wait a sec) instead of "401 Unauthorized" (go away). Much friendlier!

üîë **Key Check:** Added a new `/api/account/key` endpoint so you can check your API key status without the heavy lifting.

üê¶ **Social Sprawl:** Our news workflow now officially supports LinkedIn, Twitter, and a new Reddit folder! The hive is growing.

Building with heart, one pixel at a time. üå∏üêù

#pollinations #opensource #indiedev #pixelart #cozyvibes #devlog #generativeai #8bit
alt_text: A carousel of cozy 8-bit pixel art images. 1. A gardening journal on grass. 2. A friendly garden gate labeled 429 replacing a scary 401 sign. 3. A pixelated workbench checking a golden API key. 4. A retro RPG map showing connections to LinkedIn, Twitter, and Reddit.
